text: Daria Obratov (; born 12 December 1989) is a Croatian luger. She competed in the women's singles event at the 2018 Winter Olympics. She used to play handball in her youth, but after knee injury and 8 operations, she took up luge. Zvonimir Huktić/HINA. DARIA OBRATOV ‘Ostvarila sam svoj olimpijski san’ Nacional. Published 19 January 2018. Accessdate 12 February 2018. She failed to qualify to 2010 and 2014 Olympics. Sanjkašici Dariji Obratov olimpijska norma za ZOI u Pjongčangu Croatian Olympic Committee. Published 17 January 2018. Accessdate 12 February 2018. By qualifying for the 2018 Winter Olympics she became the first Croatian luger to compete at the Winter Olympics. Filip Ožbolt. SANJKAŠICA IZ SPLITA DANAS ISPISUJE POVIJEST NA ZIMSKIM OLIMPIJSKIM IGRAMA Nakon osam operacija i svega što sam prošla, jedva čekam ući u cilj! Sportske novosti. Published 12 February 2018. title: Daria Obratov
